blackdoor.cqbe.certificate

Class EndorsementBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackdoor.cqbe.certificate.EndorsementBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder

    public class EndorsementBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Builder
    An endorsement builder. Given two certificates and some endorsement settings, an endorsement can be composed and signed.
    Author:
    nfischer3
